short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight a startup/company to reveal what they do. By @saranyan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool I built to get information about a startup or company I read on my news feed. There are way too many of them and I find it hard to keep track off. When you install this extension, you can simply select a text on a webpage and it is queried against Angel list and Crunchbase databases to reveal what they do in an un-obtrusive popup.

Project page - https://github.com/saranyan/Reveal-Chrome-Extension
Reach out  - @saranyan
